info.title: Azure Machine Learning Model Management Service
info.description: These APIs allow end users to manage Azure Machine Learning Models, Images, Profiles, and Services.

get.summary: Query the list of Assets in a workspace.
get.description: If no filter is passed, the query lists all the Assets in the given workspace. The returned list is paginated and the count of items in each page is an optional parameter.

parameters.name: runId
parameters.description: The run Id associated with the Assets.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The object name.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve in a page.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: The continuation token to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description:
A set of tags with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of tags key or tags key=value
            Example: tagKey1,tagKey2,tagKey3=value3

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description:
A set of properties with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of properties key and/or properties key=value
            Example: propKey1,propKey2,propKey3=value3

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: An option for specifying how to order the list.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Create an Asset from the provided payload.

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: The Asset to be created.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Asset Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the Asset to delete.

200.description: The resource exists and was deleted successfully.

204.description: The resource does not exist and the request was well formed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Id of the Asset to patch.

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: The payload that is used to patch an Asset.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a model by model id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The model id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a model if it exists.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The model id.

200.description: The resource exists and was deleted successfully.

204.description: The resource does not exist and the request was well formed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing model with the specified patch.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The model id.

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: The payload that is used to patch the model.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Query the list of Models in a workspace.
get.description: The result list can be filtered using tag and name. If no filter is passed, the query lists all the Models in the given workspace. The returned list is paginated and the count of items in each page is an optional parameter.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The object name.

parameters.name: framework
parameters.description: The framework.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The object description.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve in a page.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: The continuation token to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description:
A set of tags with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of tags key or tags key=value
            Example: tagKey1,tagKey2,tagKey3=value3

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description:
A set of properties with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of properties key and/or properties key=value
            Example: propKey1,propKey2,propKey3=value3

parameters.name: runId
parameters.description: The runId which created the model.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: An option to specify how the models are ordered in the response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The payload that is used to register the model.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieve the metrics for a Model.
get.description: The operational events collected for the Model are returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Model Id.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date from which to retrieve metrics, ISO 8601 literal format.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date from which to retrieve metrics, ISO 8601 literal format.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get the status of an async operation.
get.description: Get the status of an async operation by operation id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the Profile for an Image.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: The Image Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Profile Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Get a list of Image Profiles.
get.description: If no filter is passed, the query lists all Profiles for the Image. The returned list is paginated and the count of items in each page is an optional parameter.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: The Image Id.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The Profile name.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The Profile description.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description:
A set of tags with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of tags key or tags key=value
            Example: tagKey1,tagKey2,tagKey3=value3

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description:
A set of properties with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of properties key and/or properties key=value
            Example: propKey1,propKey2,propKey3=value3

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve in a page.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: The continuation token to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The option to order the response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Create a Profile for an Image.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: The Image Id.

parameters.name: inputRequest
parameters.description: The payload that is used to create the Profile.

202.description: The request was accepted. The header 'Operation-Location' contains the async operation location URL. Accessing this URL with a GET call will return the status of the background task.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Set to True to include Model details.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

200.description: The resource exists and was deleted successfully.

204.description: The resource does not exist and the request was well formed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: The payload that is used to patch the Service.

202.description: The request was accepted.  The header 'Operation-Location' contains the async operation location URL.  Accessing this URL with a GET call will return the status of the background task.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Query the list of Services in a Workspace.
get.description: If no filter is passed, the query lists all Services in the Workspace. The returned list is paginated and the count of item in each page is an optional parameter.

parameters.name: imageId
parameters.description: The Image Id.

parameters.name: imageName
parameters.description: The Image name.

parameters.name: modelId
parameters.description: The Model Id.

parameters.name: modelName
parameters.description: The Model name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The object name.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve in a page.

parameters.name: computeType
parameters.description: The compute environment type.

parameters.name: $skipToken
parameters.description: The continuation token to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description:
A set of tags with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of tags key or tags key=value
            Example: tagKey1,tagKey2,tagKey3=value3

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description:
A set of properties with which to filter the returned models.
            It is a comma separated string of properties key and/or properties key=value
            Example: propKey1,propKey2,propKey3=value3

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Set to True to include Model details.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: The option to order the response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Create a Service with the specified payload.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The payload that is used to create the Service.

202.description: The request was accepted.  The header 'Operation-Location' contains the async operation location URL.  Accessing this URL with a GET call will return the status of the background task.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets a list of Service keys.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerate and return the Service keys.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The payload that is used to regenerate keys.

202.description: The request was accepted. The header 'Operation-Location' contains the async operation location URL.  Accessing this URL with a GET call will return the status of the background task.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets access token that can be used for calling service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The Service Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

kvTags.description: The Asset tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The Asset property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

runid.description: The RunId associated with this Asset.

meta.description: A dictionary containing metadata about the Asset.

createdTime.description: The time the Asset was created in UTC.

value.description: An array of objects of type Asset.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

version.description: The Model version assigned by Model Management Service.

datasets.description: The list of datasets associated with the model.

url.description: The URL of the Model. Usually a SAS URL.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of Model content. For more details about MIME type, please open https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

unpack.description: Indicates whether we need to unpack the Model during docker Image creation.

runId.description: The RunId that created this model.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment where this model was created.

kvTags.description: The Model tag dictionary. Items are mutable.

properties.description: The Model property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

name.description: The name of the dataset reference.

id.description: The id of the dataset reference.

value.description: An array of objects of type Model.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

ModelOperationalState.description: The operational state of the Model.

resourceLocation.description: The resource created/updated by the async operation.

parentRequestId.description: The request id that created this operation

ModelErrorResponse.description: The Model Management Service Error object.

details.description: An array of error detail objects.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

kvTags.description: The profile tags dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The profile properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

recommendedMemoryInGB.description: The recommended amount of memory to allocate in GB.

recommendationLatencyInMs.description: Latency associated with the recommended memory/cpu config

value.description: An array of objects of type ProfileResponse.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

ProfileRequestBase.description: The request for creating a profile.

ServiceResponseBase.description: The base service response. The correct inherited response based on computeType will be returned (ex. ACIServiceResponse)

kvTags.description: The service tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The service property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

operationId.description: The ID of the latest asynchronous operation for this service.

state.description: The current state of the service.

createdTime.description: The time the service was created.

updatedTime.description: The time the service was updated.

computeType.description: The compute environment type for the service.

deploymentType.description: The deployment type for the service.

value.description: An array of objects of type Service.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

CreateServiceRequest.description: The base class for creating a service.

kvTags.description: The service tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The service properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

computeType.description: The compute environment type for the service.

deploymentType.description: The deployment type for the service.

environmentImageRequest.description: The Environment, models and assets needed for inferencing.

ACIServiceResponse.description: The response for an ACI service.

scoringUri.description: The Uri for sending scoring requests.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled on the service.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate to use if SSL is enabled.

sslKey.description: The SSL key for the certificate.

publicIp.description: The public IP address for the service.

publicFqdn.description: The public Fqdn for the service.

swaggerUri.description: The Uri for sending swagger requests.

modelConfigMap.description: Details on the models and configurations.

EnvironmentImageRequest.description: Request to create a Docker image based on Environment.

driverProgram.description: The name of the driver file.

environment.description: The details of the AZURE ML environment.

environmentVariables.description: Definition of environment variables to be defined in the environment.

docker.description: The definition of a Docker container.

spark.description: The configuration for a Spark environment.

interpreterPath.description: The python interpreter path. This is only used when user_managed_dependencies=True.

userManagedDependencies.description: True means that AzureML reuses an existing python environment; False means that AzureML will create a python environment based on the Conda dependencies specification.

baseImage.description: Base image used for Docker-based runs. Mutually exclusive with BaseDockerfile.

baseDockerfile.description: Base Dockerfile used for Docker-based runs. Mutually exclusive with BaseImage.

enabled.description: Set True to perform this run inside a Docker container.

sharedVolumes.description: Set False if necessary to work around shared volume bugs on Windows.

gpuSupport.description: Run with NVidia Docker extension to support GPUs.

shmSize.description: The shared memory size setting for NVidia GPUs.

arguments.description: Extra arguments to the Docker run command.

baseImageRegistry.description: Image registry that contains the base image.

keyType.description: Specification for which type of key to generate.

keyValue.description: The value the key is set to.

ContainerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

cpu.description: The number of CPU cores on the container.

memoryInGB.description: The amount of memory on the container in GB.

gpu.description: The number of GPU cores in the container.

fpga.description: The number of FPGA PCIE devices exposed to the container. Must be multiple of 2.

driverProgram.description: The name of the driver file.

dockerFileUri.description: The Uri to the docker file.

generatedDockerFileUri.description: The Uri to the generated docker file.

AKSEndpointResponse.description: The response for an AKS Endpoint.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

namespace.description: The Kubernetes namespace of the deployment.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

aadAuthEnabled.description: Whether or not AAD authentication is enabled.

swaggerUri.description: The Uri for sending swagger requests.

scoringUri.description: The Uri for sending scoring requests.

variants.description: All the variants that belongs to this endpoint.

AKSServiceResponse.description: The response for an AKS service.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerContainer.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests per container.

maxQueueWaitMs.description: Maximum time a request will wait in the queue (in milliseconds). After this time, the service will return 503 (Service Unavailable)

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

namespace.description: The Kubernetes namespace of the deployment.

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas on the cluster.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

scoringUri.description: The Uri for sending scoring requests.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

aadAuthEnabled.description: Whether or not AAD authentication is enabled.

swaggerUri.description: The Uri for sending swagger requests.

modelConfigMap.description: Details on the models and configurations.

kvTags.description: The image tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The image properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

createdTime.description: The time the image was created.

modifiedTime.description: The time the image was last modified.

autoDelete.description: Whether the image will be automatically deleted with the last service using it.

imageBuildLogUri.description: The Uri to the image build logs.

operationId.description: The ID of the asynchronous operation for this image.

minReplicas.description: The minimum number of replicas to scale down to.

maxReplicas.description: The maximum number of replicas in the cluster.

targetUtilization.description: The target utilization percentage to use for determining whether to scale the cluster.

refreshPeriodInSeconds.description: The amount of seconds to wait between auto scale updates.

failureThreshold.description: The number of failures to allow before returning an unhealthy status.

successThreshold.description: The number of successful probes before returning a healthy status.

periodSeconds.description: The length of time between probes in seconds.

initialDelaySeconds.description: The delay before the first probe in seconds.

AKSVariantResponse.description: The response for an AKS variant.

trafficPercentile.description: The amount of traffic variant receives.

UnknownServiceResponse.description:
The response for an unsupported Service
Defines the basic service properties

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled on the service.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate to use if SSL is enabled.

sslKey.description: The SSL key for the certificate.

dnsNameLabel.description: The Dns label for the service.

AKSServiceCreateRequest.description: The request to create an AKS service.

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas on the cluster.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerContainer.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests per container.

maxQueueWaitMs.description: Maximum time a request will wait in the queue (in milliseconds). After this time, the service will return 503 (Service Unavailable)

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

aadAuthEnabled.description: Whether or not AAD authentication is enabled.

CreateEndpointRequest.description: The request to create an Endpoint in the AKS.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

aadAuthEnabled.description: Whether or not AAD authentication is enabled.

trafficPercentile.description: The amount of traffic variant receives.

resourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroup
resourceGroupParameter.description: The Name of the resource group in which the workspace is located.
